definition: to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate

sentences.english: The USFA compiled state-by-state residential guidelines for smoke alarms.
sentences.chinese: 美国联邦消防署编撰每州对住宅烟雾警报器的准则。

sentences.english: The third chapter is about the compilation state in mid period of Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，论述了清中期南明史编撰状况。

sentences.english: Our country the first composed the Chronicles history "age".
sentences.chinese: 编撰了我国第一部编年体史书《春秋》。

sentences.english: I also compiled dictionaries with the terminology that appears in the story.
sentences.chinese: 我也会编撰词典纪录故事中出现过的专有词。

sentences.english: Darwin followed up with The Origin of Species in 1859.
sentences.chinese: 达尔文继续编撰，于1859年出版《物种起源》。

sentences.english: Whenever I read The Analects by thy disciples.
sentences.chinese: 每当我阅读您弟子们编撰的《论语》。

sentences.english: The lower piece of writing, mainly discuss its compiling means and reason.
sentences.chinese: 下篇，主要探讨《高士传》的编撰方法与原因。

sentences.english: It has breaked the mould of traditional dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 突破了传统英汉双解词典的编撰思路和模式。

sentences.english: Legend said the book was compiled by Confucius, and is the equivalent to The Red Book of Mao in the modern time.
sentences.chinese: 这本书传说是孔子编撰的，相当于儒家的红宝书。

sentences.english: This remarkable dictionary represents the fruits of their labors.
sentences.chinese: 这本优秀的词典是编撰者艰辛劳动的成果。

sentences.english: She has said she plans an encyclopedia on the series.
sentences.chinese: 她表示已有计划为该系列编撰一本百科全书。

sentences.english: Kassel, Germany is the heart and birthplace of the fairytales authored by the Brothers Grimm.
sentences.chinese: 德国的卡塞尔造就和孕育了格林兄弟编撰的童话故事。

sentences.english: It's of great significance to have the classic compiled and put into use at that time.
sentences.chinese: 《帝鉴图说》的编撰及使用在当时是有积极意义的。

sentences.english: His created a five-way system of with the core structure of materials of novels.
sentences.chinese: 他以小说史料为核心的编撰结构，自成体系。

sentences.english: Compilation of China's first chronological history books, "Spring and Autumn."
sentences.chinese: 编撰了我国第一部编年体史书《春秋》。

sentences.english: Ruan Yuan was an important minister and a famous author of Jin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 阮元是清代重臣，也是一位著名的图书编撰家。

definition: to set in print/to diffuse/to publish
to compose (a piece of writing)/to write/(written) work/writer
variant of 匯編|汇编[hui4 bian1]
